body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Peter Alexander and the customer's name is Karen Stewart.  The conversation is about MetaCar (a Car Rental Agency ) and is a conversation about customer service.The customer is feeling {emotion}.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, welcome to MetaCar. My name is Peter Alexander, and I'm here to assist you today.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi Peter. I'm Karen Stewart. I'm feeling a bit frustrated with my car rental experience.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I'm sorry to hear that, Karen. I want to help resolve your issues. Can you please tell me the reservation number you have?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it's four five six seven eight nine.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for that. Could you also provide me with your email address to pull up your account?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great, thank you, Karen. I see your reservation and I understand the issue you are facing. Let me assist you with that.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I appreciate that, Peter. I've been waiting too long for my car.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I completely understand your frustration. We are working hard to improve our service times. I can expedite your request right now.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: That would be fantastic. Thank you!

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Karen! Thank you for your time today. If you have any further questions, feel free to ask.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Karen! Have a great day!
